titleStmt.title: The treaty betwixt the Most Christian King, the King of Great Britain, and the States General of the United Provinces for settling the succession of the crown of Spain and the dominions thereunto belonging in case his Catholick Majesty die without issue in English and French.
Treaties, etc. 1700 Mar. 3
titleStmt.author: France.
England and Wales. Treaties, etc. France, 1700 Mar. 3.
United Provinces of the Netherlands. Treaties, etc. France, 1700 Mar. 25.
United Provinces of the Netherlands. Staten Generaal.

notesStmt.note: Treaty signed by France and England on Mar. 3, 1700, and by France and the States General of the United Provinces on Mar. 25, 1700.

Caption title: Traité entre le roy tres chretien, le roy de la Grande Bretagne, & les Seigneurs Estats Generaux des Provinces Unies de Pais bas : A treaty between the Most Christian King, the King of Great Britain, and the Lords States General of the United Provinces of the Low Countries.
French and English in parallel columns.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
